channel.name: TRT World TR
channel.title: Africa Matters
channel.desc: Every week, Africa Matters will bring you the untold, under-reported stories from across the continent and we'll also unpack the issues that matter to Africans.

channel.name: TRT World TR
channel.title: Bigger Than Five
channel.desc: Featuring interviews with political leaders and key policy makers from around the world, Bigger Than Five takes a critical look at issues of global injustice.

channel.name: TRT World TR
channel.title: Just 2 Degrees
channel.desc: A rise of just two degrees in average temperatures means catastrophe for planet Earth. TRT World looks at the cold, hard truths behind a warming planet.

channel.name: TRT World TR
channel.title: News
channel.desc: TRT World brings the latest news from around the globe, when it happens.

channel.name: TRT World TR
channel.title: Scoreline
channel.desc: Do you need a fast-paced and punchy show to cover all the weekend?s sport action? TRT World?s Scoreline is your programme on Saturday and Sundays.

channel.name: TRT World TR
channel.title: Debrief
channel.desc: DEBRIEF is a weekly show that delivers the most important news and stories from the week in a concise format.
